attributes.background: A drive-through or drive-thru ),  take-out service provided that allows customers to purchase products without leaving their cars.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Hospitality venues can already provide food and non-alcoholic drinks on a takeaway basis (between 5am and 11pm). You can find out more about current restrictions on hospitality venues here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/further-businesses-and-premises-to-close/closing-certain-businesses-and-venues-in-england#businesses-subject-to-restrictions
